name: Bread City
description:
A short game with 3d rendered backgrounds,

A piece of 🍞bread is tired of seeing bread, will something change?

▶ 'add to homescreen' version

to play in a larger view on iOS click the link above, and to play in fullscreen, press 'add to homescreen' in safari 


Controls

keyboard: WASD / Arrow Keys to move

touch: press and drag for virtual joystick
